raw_text:
Based on the paper content, I'll extract the structured information following the required format:

```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Impact of a human capital and cash transfer intervention on individual disempowerment in Northern Uganda",
    "matches_expected_title": "NO"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "Women's Income Generating Support (WINGS) Program",
    "country": "Uganda",
    "region": "Northern Uganda (Kitgum and Gulu districts)",
    "target_population": "Ultra-poor and conflict-affected women"
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": true,
      "cash_support_type": "cash transfer",
      "cash_amount": "150 USD",
      "cash_frequency": "one-time",
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": "When examining different elements of the intervention, we find that it was in fact the cash transfer of 150 USD that had a significant impact on reducing the overlapping deprivations"
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": false,
      "assets_provided": [],
      "direct_provision": "UNCLEAR",
      "assets_evidence_citation": null
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "income",
      "consumption",
      "food security",
      "asset accumulation",
      "women's empowerment",
      "physical health",
      "social cohesion",
      "well-being"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "the authors evaluate the effectiveness of the WINGS program on a number of selected outcomes... find that the program was successful at increasing the probability of starting an enterprise and working in both agricultural and non-agricultural enterprises, increasing income, consumption, durable assets and food security",
    "study_design": "Randomized Controlled Trial (RCT)",
    "design_evidence_citation": "Using a randomised controlled trial across 120 villages in Northern Uganda",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": "2009-2012",
    "sample_size": 120,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": false,
    "qualitative_methods": [],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": null,
    "has_cost_data": false,
    "cost_mentions": null,
    "cost_evidence_citation": null
  },
  "evidence_citations": {
    "program_name_citation": "Women's Income Generating Support (WINGS) program-on the multiple dimensions of (dis)empowerment faced by conflict-affected and ultra-poor women",
    "country_citation": "in two of the most war-affected districts in Northern Uganda: Kitgum and Gulu",
    "target_population_citation": "conflict-affected and ultra-poor women in two of the most war-affected districts in Northern Uganda"
  }
}
```
